document_data.name: Mereld
document_data.mainbody: '''Mereld''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Whether through some device or a spell, he was capable of blasting his foes.
document_data.Possessions: Mereld was wearing a cloak during his mission in [[Shadowdale]].
document_data.History: Mereld was one of the War Wizards tapped by the highknight [[Eskrel Starbridge]] for his mission to [[Shadowdale]], seeking to apprehend the fugitive [[Elminster Aumar]] personally. However, they met a fake Elminster instead: a group of [[doppelganger]]s, one of which Mereld was commanded to blast away rather than let it get away. Later, they came across another fake Elminster, this one being actually the noblewoman [[Storm Silverhand]]. She deftly outmaneuvered the group and convinced Eskrel Starbridge to hand over a ''[[teleport ring]]''; Mereld questioned why, but didn't push the matter afterwards.
